statements: SELECT * FROM security_events;
SELECT event_type, event_timestamp, severity FROM security_events WHERE status = 'Success';
SELECT event_description, source_ip, destination_ip FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Login';
SELECT * FROM security_events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_type, status FROM security_events WHERE severity > 5;
SELECT * FROM security_events WHERE status = 'confirmed';
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_description FROM security_events WHERE severity > 5 ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_type, status, source_ip, destination_ip FROM security_events WHERE severity BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC;
SELECT event_id, event_type, status, severity FROM security_events WHERE source_ip LIKE '192.168.%';
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_timestamp, destination_ip FROM security_events WHERE event_description LIKE '%attack%' ORDER BY severity DESC, event_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_networks ORDER BY network_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, network_name FROM financial_networks WHERE network_type = 'Public';
SELECT network_name, security_level FROM financial_networks WHERE security_level LIKE 'High%';
SELECT * FROM financial_networks WHERE network_type = 'Private' AND security_level = 'High' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT event_type, event_date FROM security_events ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM financial_networks WHERE id = 1;
SELECT network_name, network_type FROM financial_networks WHERE security_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Data Breach' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_date FROM security_events WHERE event_date >= '2021-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT event_id, event_description FROM security_events WHERE event_description LIKE '%vulnerability%';
SELECT * FROM siem_events;
SELECT event_type, event_timestamp FROM siem_events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT alert_type, alert_level, alert_timestamp FROM security_alerts WHERE alert_level = 'High';
SELECT activity_type, source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_activity WHERE activity_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_timestamp, event_details FROM siem_events LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM siem_events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM security_alerts WHERE alert_level = 'High';
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM siem_events WHERE event_type = 'Login' AND event_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, alert_level FROM security_alerts WHERE alert_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT activity_id, activity_type, source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_activity WHERE activity_type = 'Data Transfer' ORDER BY activity_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT account_number, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE account_number LIKE 'ACC%';
SELECT * FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Login' AND event_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM network_activity WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1' OR destination_ip = '10.0.0.1';
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, account_number FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT event_type, event_timestamp FROM security_events WHERE event_type IN ('login', 'logout') ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_activity WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1' OR destination_ip = '10.0.0.1';
SELECT log_timestamp, alert_level, log_message FROM alert_logs WHERE alert_level = 'HIGH' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_institutions;
SELECT name, type FROM financial_institutions WHERE type='Bank';
SELECT system_name, system_vendor FROM siem_systems ORDER BY system_vendor DESC;
SELECT event_type, event_description, event_timestamp FROM security_events WHERE event_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_id, log_type, log_details, log_timestamp FROM security_logs WHERE log_type='Access' ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_institutions;
SELECT name, type FROM financial_institutions WHERE type='Bank';
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM security_events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT system_name, system_vendor FROM siem_systems WHERE system_vendor='IBM' ORDER BY system_name ASC;
SELECT log_type, log_details, log_timestamp FROM security_logs WHERE log_type='Access Control' AND log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
